Psalms__03.1: The psalm of David when he fled from the face of his son Absalom.
Psalms__03.2: Why, O Lord, are they multiplied that afflict me? many are they who rise up against me.
Psalms__03.3: Many say to my soul: There is no salvation for him in his God.
Psalms__03.4: But thou, O Lord art my protector, my glory, and the lifter up of my head.
Psalms__03.5: I have cried to the Lord with my voice: and he hath heard me from his holy hill.
Psalms__03.6: I have slept and taken my rest: and I have risen up, because the Lord hath protected me.
Psalms__03.7: I will not fear thousands of the people, surrounding me: arise, O Lord; save me, O my God.
Psalms__03.8: For thou hast struck all them who are my adversaries without cause: thou hast broken the teeth of sinners.
Psalms__03.9: Salvation is of the Lord: and thy blessing is upon thy people.
